title: Pictures of the Day
post:
Yes, and yes.
And no.
It has been a fascinating experience in many ways. The Shroud contingent has been based in the “Review of Religions” journal tent, which this year is devoted exclusively to exhibitions of the Koran and the Shroud, but the Caliph of the Ahmadiyya Muslim Community has asked Barrie to address the whole Jalsa this afternoon (Sunday). This is directly comparable to, say, Pope Francis personally asking Barrie to address an assembly of several thousand at an audience. Perhaps next time…
author: Hugh Farey
